long_description: The double-walled REI Recycled tumbler with flip-top lid keeps your coffee hot on your morning commute. Not only can this tumbler be recycled at the end of its useful life, it's also made from 97% recycled polypropylene. 25% of the material is post-consumer content. Double-wall insulation keeps beverages hot or cold for approximately 30 mins. Flip-top lid screws on tightly to limit spills. Tumbler is sized to fit in most car cup holders. Tumbler can be recycled where #5 plastics are accepted; lid is not recyclable. Microwave and dishwasher safe (top rack only).
short_description: The double-walled REI Recycled tumbler with flip-top lid keeps your coffee hot on your morning commute.
